overview: Hank has it all. Looks, money and an affinity for hot looking guys without inhibitions. He's living the life, wild parties, booze and a non-stop parade of studs. No one has ever turned him down, until Donny showed up. Beautiful electric Donny who unwittingly becomes the sole object of Hank's desire. Donny was totally unprepared for Hank's world yet he alone holds the power to bring it all to an end. All he has to say is "yes".
title: Sex Saga
